verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>. As <S%H5492>whirlwinds<s%> in the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H2498>pass<s%> <S%H935>through<s%>; so it comes from the <S%H4057>desert<s%>, from a <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>.

A <S%H7186>severe<s%> <S%H2380>vision<s%> is <S%H5046>declared<s%> unto <S%H898>me<s%>; the treacherous dealer deals <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> <S%H7703>spoils<s%>. Go <S%H5927>up<s%>, O <S%H5867>Elam<s%>: <S%H6696>besiege<s%>, O <S%H4074>Media<s%>; all the <S%H585>sighing<s%> there have I made to <S%H7673>cease<s%>.

Therefore is my <S%H4975>body<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2479>pain<s%>: <S%H6735>pangs<s%> have taken <S%H270>hold<s%> upon <S%H6735>me<s%>, as the pangs of a woman in <S%H3205>childbirth<s%>: I was bowed <S%H5753>down<s%> at the <S%H8085>hearing<s%> of <S%H926>it<s%>; I was dismayed at the seeing of <S%H7200>it<s%>.

My <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H8582>panted<s%>, <S%H6427>fearfulness<s%> <S%H1204>frightened<s%> <S%H5399>me<s%>: the night of my <S%H2837>pleasure<s%> has he <S%H7760>turned<s%> into fear unto <S%H2731>me<s%>.

<S%H6186>Prepare<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>, <S%H6822>watch<s%> in the <S%H6844>watchtower<s%>, <S%H398>eat<s%>, <S%H8354>drink<s%>: <S%H6965>arise<s%>, you <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4043>shield<s%>.
For thus has the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>me<s%>, Go, <S%H5975>set<s%> a <S%H6822>watchman<s%>, let him <S%H5046>declare<s%> what he <S%H7200>sees<s%>.

And he <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> with a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> of <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, and a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%>; and he <S%H7181>listened<s%> <S%H7182>diligently<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7182>care<s%>:

And he cried <S%H7121>like<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%>: My <S%H136>lord<s%>, I <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> upon the <S%H4707>watchtower<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%>, and I am <S%H5324>set<s%> in my <S%H4931>post<s%> whole <S%H3915>nights<s%>:

<S%H935>And<s%>, behold, here comes a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%>, with a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>. And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>, is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>; and all the engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> of her <S%H430>gods<s%> he has <S%H7665>broken<s%> unto the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

O my <S%H4098>threshing<s%>, and the <S%H1121>corn<s%> of my <S%H1637>floor<s%>: that which I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, have I declared unto <S%H5046>you<s%>.

The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H1746>Dumah<s%>. He <S%H7121>calls<s%> to me out of <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, <S%H8104>Watchman<s%>, what of the <S%H3915>night<s%>? <S%H8104>Watchman<s%>, what of the <S%H3915>night<s%>?

The <S%H8104>watchman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%>, and also the <S%H3915>night<s%>: if you will <S%H1158>inquire<s%>, <S%H1158>inquire<s%> <S%H7725>you<s%>: return, <S%H857>come<s%>.
The <S%H4853>burden<s%> upon <S%H6152>Arabia<s%>. In the <S%H3293>forest<s%> in <S%H6152>Arabia<s%> shall you <S%H3885>lodge<s%>, O you travelling <S%H736>companies<s%> of <S%H1720>Dedanim<s%>.

The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> <S%H857>brought<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H7125>him<s%> that was <S%H6771>thirsty<s%>, they <S%H6923>met<s%> with their <S%H3899>bread<s%> him that <S%H5074>fled<s%>.

For they <S%H5074>fled<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H2719>swords<s%>, <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H5203>drawn<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H1869>bent<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H3514>grievousness<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>.

For thus has the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8141>me<s%>, Inside a year, according to the <S%H8141>years<s%> of a <S%H7916>hireling<s%>, all the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%>:

And the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H7198>archers<s%>, the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>, shall be <S%H4591>few<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.
